exclusion.criterion: Diabetes mellitus for which the patient uses insulin
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Significant co-morbidities which, according to the treating nephrologists, makes it unlikely that the patient will be able to complete the foreseen study period
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a documented positive serum MPO-ANCA and is being treated with corticosteroid and cyclophosphamides. His Birmingham Vasculitis Activity Score (BVAS) is above 4.
